entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with a few rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
